item.title: How do i add a menu and make it accessable by a command?
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

public void menu(){ sendQuest(" ", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest(" ", 8145); sendQuest(" ", 8147); sendQuest(" ", 8148); sendQuest(" ", 8149); sendQuest(" ", 8150); sendQuest(" ", 8152); sendQuest(" ", 8153); sendQuest(" ", 8154); sendQuest(" ", 8155); sendQuest(" ", 8156); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

After you make a menu similar to that. CTRL + F, search for a command you use on your server then make another command that looks like this

if(command.startsWith("menu")) { menu(); }

Compile and run. Post here again if you have any errors.

[hr]
And to everyone else that viewed this and didn’t help, you must be ashamed.

Read full topic
